hero.name: Samuel Fernandez Toledo
hero.title: Digital Alchemist & Engineer
hero.intro: Weaving the esoteric into the digital. Exploring the intersection of technology, spirituality, and the human psyche.

about.bio: Born in the winter of 2005, I am a seeker of hidden truths and a builder of digital realms. Currently pursuing 'Ingenieria Informatica' at the University of Malaga, I blend the rigorous logic of code with the intuitive depths of the spirit.
